term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - degrees of triad isotacticity, syndiotacticity, and heterotacticity
term.title: degrees of triad isotacticity, syndiotacticity, and heterotacticity

item.text: The fractions of triads in a regular vinyl polymer that are of the mm, rr and mr = rm types, respectively. In cases where triad analysis is not attainable, the diad isotacticity and diad syndiotacticity may be defined as the fractions of diads in a regular vinyl polymer that are of the m and r types, respectively. (m = meso; r = racemic).
